name: Combat Shooting Elite
description:
Kill the terrorists in the hills area with secret agent skills and save the nation from the gangsters. Be a real fury hero, shoot the criminals and enter in the base camp of the enemy

Features:
- Gun snatching facility from enemy commando
- Unlimited bullets in each D-Day mission
- Well equipped and well-prepared enemy force
- 3D adventurous and thrilling war environment
- Enemy camps, buildings and check posts to destroy
- Simple and easy game play
